Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of visa officer's decision to refuse work permit
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Application for judicial review under IRPA s.72(1)
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant lacked credibility; failed to answer questions about duties and explain missing work certificates
Crimes.Evidence_Type: GCMS notes, refusal letter, application documents
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Credibility concerns and insufficient evidence of professional experience
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to provide credible evidence of work experience as a cook
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the visa officerâ€™s refusal was reasonable
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credible evidence and credibility issues regarding professional experience
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Missing work certificates, inability to explain discrepancies
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Interview conducted; opportunity to respond provided
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant could not describe job duties or explain missing documentation
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of refusal decision
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Compliance with procedural fairness in refusal process

Crimes.Crime_Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial Review of Work Permit Refusal
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of visa officer's refusal of work permit application
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant demonstrated credibility issues during interview and could not resolve inconsistencies
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Application materials, GCMS notes, interview record
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Allegation that refusal decision was unreasonable
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Deficiencies in evidence and credibility problems
Crimes.Application_Error: Inability to substantiate professional experience as a cook
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Was the refusal of the work permit application reasonable?
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Insufficient proof of work experience and inconsistent statements
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of verifiable employment records, failure to explain gaps
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Applicant interviewed and given chance to clarify
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Failed to answer basic job-related questions, unexplained discrepancies
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Adherence to procedural fairness in assessment
